entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasi] `Invariant.Tests` failing with `Failed to load ./icudt.dat` #82567
  • Improve codegen for Vector128.Shift* operations where a direct intrinsic is not available #82564
  • [wasi] Tracking issue for test failures #82561
  • [API Proposal]: Vector128/256 AddSaturate/RemoveSaturate #82559
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Create FrozenArray #82552
  • Garbage collector may crash when new byte[] and GC.AllocateUninitializedArray(n, true) is mixed extensively. #82548
    8.0.0
  • NTLM 401 macOS (Apple sillicon) #82547
  • llvm-symbolizer invocation failure #82544
  • Mono: Crash when accessing a field of a null class object #82535
  • Sample to customize what STJ considers a 'JSON null'/Ignoring property writing #82530
  • Investigate adjusting herustics for unrolled block copies/initialization #82529
  • HttpStress execution failure on Windows #82528
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a RangeAttribute constructor supporting arbitrary IComparable ranges. #82526
    Future
  • C# mangling affects troubleshooting #82524
  • Unexpected `QuicStream.WriteAsync` exception #82523
  • [API Proposal]: Make Parallel.For method support function pointers #82522
  • Regressions in System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PhysicalAddressTests #82537
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 4 Regressions on 2/19/2023 10:06:54 AM #82538
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 9 Regressions on 2/14/2023 11:18:21 PM #82540
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 10 Regressions on 2/20/2023 2:00:07 PM #82541
  • [BUG] Version downgrade in .NET 7 for System.IO.Compression.Native.dll leads to broken Microsoft Installers #82518
  • [wasi] Wasi.Build.Tests - windows failures #82515
    8.0.0
  • .net 8 Failed SSL Connection at andoird api 21 download #82514
  • Half type Max/Min value is different from documentation #82508
  • ComInterfaceGenerator generates code with pointer type in generic #82504

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] cross-compiling to osx-arm64 from osx-x64 does not work #82542
    8.0.0
  • Eliminate allocations when enumerating empty collections #59596
    8.0.0
  • EnsureCapacity() on List<> increments the version #82455
    Future
  • No .webcil files after publish [Linux/x64 - static Blazor WASM] #82549
    8.0.0
  • The Parallel.ForEachAsync with synchronous source can block many threads #81877
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/DefaultInterfaceMethods/reabstraction/reabstraction/reabstraction.sh #82127
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expand data validation attributes #77402
    8.0.0
  • Rename linker to illink #78059
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch and System.Tests.Perf_Single #82539
  • [wasi] `System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException : Only the invariant culture is supported in globalization-invariant mode. ` #81908
    8.0.0
  • Can't retrieve MemoryCache statistics using dotnet-counters #82502
  • superpmi diff/replay jobs are failing #82506
  • get some docker images with libmsquic from main that contains OpenSSL 3 -- @wfurt #82463
  • Segmentation fault in static library (AOT) #82511
  • Add possibility to add configuration files from anywhere #82485
  • Consider adding IEqualityOperators<string, string, bool> to System.String #81173

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Determine IlcHostPackageName from host OS, not target OS #82566
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement RSA.GetMaxOutputSize #82565
    area-System.Security
  • Remove fragile NGen logic for precomputed hashcodes #82563
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [6.0] Fix intellisense xml file selection from 'net' or 'dotnet-plat-ext' #82562
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Add PeriodicTimer.Period property #82560
  • Add and use public TaskToAsyncResult helper type #82557
  • [class] Don't put DIMs into the vtable of abstract classes #82556
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][debugger] Support symbol server on mobile devices #82555
  • [7.0] Fix intellisense xml file selection from 'net' or 'dotnet-plat-ext' #82554
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Support raw ECDH key agreements #82551
    area-System.Security
  • eng/SourceBuild.props: when unset, let the repo determine RuntimeOS. #82546
    community-contribution
  • Move throw out of inlined CompositeFormat helper #82543
  • Make area-owners.json true source for all area like labels dependencies #82534
  • [browser] remove custom startup sequence of blazor #82532
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • .NET 6: enable building on platforms where strict-prototypes is on by default. #82525
    community-contribution
  • Vectorize Convert.FromHexString #82521
  • [mono] permission denied when reading a jitdump file #82520
    community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Emit llvm intrinsic declarations lazily. #82519
  • Remove EXTRA_*FLAGS. #82516
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share some "Compiles" tests with ComInterfaceSourceGenerator #82505

Merged

  • Add osx-arm64 to official RIDs in ILCompiler NuGet #82558
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add RCPC ISA detection on win-arm64 #82527
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasi] Add `wasi-experimental` workload, `wasiconsole` template, and `Wasi.Build.Tests` #81849
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [workload] Upstream net7 manifest json and targets #82267
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Return singleton enumerators from IEnumerable.GetEnumerator for empty collections #82499
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Use throw helpers in a few more places #82533
  • Refactor common variables used for the "send runtime tests to helix" steps into a shared template that all of our pipelines that run runtime tests can use. #81926
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] On importing a CEE_INITOBJ for a simd, construct a VecCon(0) #81982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Always transform `AND(X, CNS(-1))` to `X` #82276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary _version++ from a few places #82500
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • Rename ProduceBy enum to Tool #82550
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Don't spend cycles zeroing constrainedResolvedToken each iteration #82531
  • Add Microsoft.NET.ILLink package #82407
    linkable-framework, 8.0.0
  • Use asynchronous lock in Parallel.ForEachAsync with synchronous enumerable #82501
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Replace some use of string.CompareOrdinal with string == #82438
  • JIT: don't optimize calls to CORINFO_HELP_VIRTUAL_FUNC_PTR for interface class lookups #82209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Fix perf pipeline runs from variable error #82553
  • JIT: Lift remaining cmov restrictions by introducing GT_SELECTCC #82235
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid locking on every ValidationAttributeStore lookup. #82536
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, 8.0.0
  • Add new System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations features #82311
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Run check before generating the config file #82435
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Update ILLink wording #82050
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Port remaining AOT tests #82509
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix JIT pipeline issues with instantiation #82512
  • [Mono]: Add support for lazy runtime init in native-to-managed wrapper, similar to NativeAOT library build. #82253
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Wasi icu loading #82444
  • Adding more SIMD constant folding support #82190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix passing Mac Catalyst -target flag to .mm builds #82292
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix build with old gcc #82513
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Replace RichNav with Code Index #82088
    area-Infrastructure
  • [jiterp] Fix stelem_ref not doing a type check #82507
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Annotation changes only (part 2) #82388
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Deduplicate platform lists in BuildIntegration #82395
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't run non-wasm test lanes for jiterpreter-only changes #82510
  • [mono][jit] Refactor SIMD type detection. #82419
  • Proposed host runtime delegate for loading an assembly #82138
    area-Host

Updated

  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [workloads] Bump net7 package version #82270
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ICorProfiler API to allow profiler created providers to have a callback when a session enables them #80528
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • EventPipe env var to disable stack collection #82470
    EventPipe, 8.0.0
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Convert all usages of target_link_libraries to use PUBLIC/PRIVATE specifiers #81924
    area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor `Interop.LocalAlloc` #82450
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Add support for dumping native stacks with cdb #82189
    area-Infrastructure
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix rva[cns] folding #81854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Split generic virtual method slot use and impl tracking #82222
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasi+browser] bundle timezones into .wasm #82250
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2121425 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SafeHandle debug-only _ctorStackTrace for mono #82376
  • [release/7.0] Fix disposing root X.509 certificate prematurely for OCSP stapling #82277
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.5
  • Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82245
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adding HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT #82249
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [eventpipe] Perform endian aware serialization of structs and arrays above FireETW layer #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Let GenTreeCopyOrReload handle scenarios when FEATURE_MULTIREG_RET is disabled #82451
  • [HTTP/3] Attempt at using newer image to allow H/3 Windows stress #82226
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.C.ConfigurationManager #82259
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Store Parallel.ForEachAsync exceptions from cancellation callbacks #82434
  • Fixed name of frozen string dictionary files #82482
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Replace `SafeLocalAllocHandle` in `System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter` #82456
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary `unsafe` modifier from `LibraryImport` methods #82462
    community-contribution
  • [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #82429
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fixed the 3rd argument for TypedArray.fill() #82480
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • provide custom marshaller for USER_INFO_1 #82350
    community-contribution
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #81187
    area-Host
  • [jiterp] Adjust jiterpreter thresholds to exercise it more on CI #82476
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, WASM] Problem when used as WASM plugin / being run with wasmer #2205
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, WASM] Export methods #2204

Closed

  • For Alpine and Void-Linux: If you use linux-musl-x64 for dotnet publish #2202

PullRequests

Created

  • Create Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler.LLVM.props #2203
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement PInvoke #2201
  • Add Stream boilerplate source-generator and attribute #2185

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishAOT property causes build failure when used with earlier TFMS in `TargetFrameworks` property #30814
    8.0.1xx
  • Missing PackageDefinitions metadata after 7.0.200 update #30809
  • GenAPI: Filter out generic base class, generic interface if type parameter/s are filtered out. #30805
  • [blazor] dotnet..js file name is missing version info #30802
    7.0.3xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [Servicing] Fix Property Parsing in `publish` and `pack` #30826
  • [Breaking Backport] Fix Encoding On Non EN Languages #30823
  • Download ILCompiler target pack when cross-compiling #30818
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30810
  • Fix passing --interactive flag to nuget #30806
  • GenAPI: improve error handling, extend test coverage. #30803
    Area-GenAPI
  • Produce reference assembly when target is .NET Standard #30792

Merged

  • Fix GenAPI invocation with IncludeAssemblyAttributes #30779
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.9.2 to 19.10.0 in /eng/dependabot #30746
    dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Updated

  • fix issue 30369 enable docker build platform switch #30762
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow multiple loggers for VSTest command #30686
    Area-DotNet Test, DO NOT MERGE
  • 24004: Add --configfile switch to dotnet list package #30615
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Issue 25536 enable -disable-build-servers for pack, clean, test, msbuild #30481
    Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2121313 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Investigate https://github.com/dotnet/templating/issues/5921 #30732

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set
  • Consider having enums auto-implement IEquatable<T> #2349

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typo #6998
  • Publish notes for Roles WG 2023-02-15 #6990
  • Publish extension WG notes for 2023-02-21 #6991
  • Delete non-record-primary-constructors.md #6993

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make fixer for `CS0535` smarter when implementing `IEnumerable<T>` #67023
  • No completion for primary constructor parameters in Watch window in initializers #67021
  • `SyntaxGenerator`: cannot add an operator member declaration to an interface declaration #67019
  • Extract method refactoring is not offered in the base class argument #67017
  • Change signature refactoring doesn't update argument list in `class_base` #67016
  • Feature "Diagnostic analyzer runner" is currently unavailable due to an internal error (due to an assert) #67015
  • Move PreviewWorkspace diagnostic computation to OOP #67014
    17.6
  • Unexpected "IDE0060 Remove unused parameter" suggestion for a Primary Constructor parameter #67013
  • Formatting is not triggered after ending class declaration with a semicolon #67011
  • IDE0260 recommends switching to invalid pattern #67010

Closed

  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in ReplacePropertyWithMethodsCodeRefactoringProvider #41159
    Backlog
  • C#, Editor, 'Split string literals on enter' not honoring EOL convention. #41322
    Backlog
  • XML Doc Comment parser does not consider tuple syntax to be valid in crefs #22626
    Backlog
  • Incorrect `IDE0042` when tuple variable has usages #66994
  • Operators are classified as methods in tooltips #38783
    Backlog
  • Debug assertion failure in PerAnalyzerState.TryStartSyntaxAnalysis #65849
  • Assertion failure in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.AnalysisState.PerAnalyzerState.TryStartSyntaxAnalysis #65750
  • Crash in AnalzyerDriver. #66878
    17.6
  • Introduce StateKind.AttemptingToComplete for partial analysis state tracking #65330
    Backlog
  • Intellisense does not list members for 3th parameter in GroupJoin #38518
    Backlog
  • c# intellisense not autocompleting type names in VS 2019 #41234
    Backlog
  • Pattern matching - Local variable might not be initialized before accessing #41228
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix project system brokered service #67029
  • Minor source build fixes #67028
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove the PreviewWorkspace SolutionCrawler functionality #67027
  • Disable EnC for more Primary Constructors scenarios #67026
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Move code that uses Notification part of a code style option to analyzer #67022
  • Port Rename and Formatting tests to the new framework #67020
  • Make SimplifierOptions public #67012
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #67007
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Fix crash in 'replace property with methods' #67008
    Next
  • Respect user specified new-line character in split-string #67009
    Next
  • Remove callback functionality from symbol search #67024
    Next
  • Properly use 'ValueTuple' instead of native tuples in cref syntax. #66996
    Next
  • Add nullability info field into discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fix 'tuple can be deconstructed' issue with top level statements #66997
    Next
  • Fix SymbolDisplay to use 'Operator' kind when producing the display for an operator symbol #66880
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove CheckServerState #66998
    Next
  • Add feature to suggest make struct members `readonly` #66954
    Next

Updated

  • Filter source generator diagnostics by `SuppressMessageAttribute` #66965
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Check count before reusing cached items in `BatchNode` #66992
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Clean and rename FeatureOnOffOptions #66881
    Area-IDE
  • Improve the spans that 'add parameter check' is supported in #67004
  • Fix simplification in nameof expressions #67002
  • Rename options to editorconfig like name #66899
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid deep recursion while emitting deeply nested logical conditions #66993
    Area-Compilers
  • Update Telemetry Logger #66826
    Area-IDE
  • Results of running 'make member readonly' on IDE #66957
  • Fix signature help parameter selection #66988
  • Use extension keyword with modifiers #66919
    Area-Compilers
  • SymbolDisplay show modifiers for default interface implementations and static abstract members #66712
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • Local state tracing instrumentation #66768
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix completions in range expressions #66959
    Community
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Create documentation of http3 and proxy usage #46853
  • iisexpresstray crashes when starting a site from visual studio 2022 17.5.0 #46851
  • Blazor Routes API Request to Page #46850
  • NavigationManager.NavigateThis throws an exception #46849
  • SignalR send can take minutes to complete the task #46847
  • Blazor WASM Standalone #46846
  • SignalR - OnConnectedAsync not triggered if utilized in partial class #46841
  • Perf regression: updates #46840
  • False positive RenderFragment warnings #46839
  • Model binding always fails with decimal and double types when culture number format is different from InvariantCulture #46837
  • Quarantine ComponentDisposeMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit #46836
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Quarantine CanUseFocusExtensionToFocusElementPreventScroll #46835
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Issue with SignalR scale using redis backplane in sentinel mode (HA) #46832
  • Error in WebAPI model validation with records #46831
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, json #46830
  • The `asp-for` tag helper should render an `aria-describedby` attribute #46829
  • ASP.Net Core 7 Email confirmation code is not persisted to Redis #46827
  • Support customizing component rendering via a base class #46826
    Backlog

Closed

  • ProblemDetailsService Can Simplify Writers Evaluation #45052
    8.0-preview2
  • [Blazor Server] OnConnectionUp and Down every three minutes #46807
  • Follow up to flaky 2.0 retries #42998
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ANCM intermittently notifies the wrong HttpContext of disconnect #40498
    8.0-preview2
  • How can an existing assembly be read in Blazor WASM? #46754
  • Blazor WebAssembly loading indicator shows more than 100% in .NET 8 Preview 1 #46822
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct #46816
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #46815
  • Make Parallel.For method support function pointers #46833
  • Azure AppService terminating Asp net core web app (.net 5) process #46817
  • Resolve routing RegEx constraint dependency size issue #46142
    8.0-preview2
  • -- #46828
  • Not all values of `Url.Page(values)` show up in the Get method of the page model #46796
  • `IEmailSender` doesn't appear to be HTML message in gmail body. #46802
  • Memory leak in Blazor Server InputFile #46656

PullRequests

Created

  • Suggest team members to run CI checks for long-standing PRs #46848
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for indented text writer to RDG #46845
    * NO MERGE *, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Suppress downgrade error in hosting bundle #46844
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Suppress downgrade error in hosting bundle #46843
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Suppress downgrade error in hosting bundle #46842
    area-infrastructure
  • Add shared test infra for RDF and RDG #46838
    area-runtime
  • Metrics factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *

Merged

  • Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46644
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview2
  • Wait for Request to finish #46176
    servers-iis, area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Use new Chromium headless mode to fix E2E test timeouts #46812
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview2
  • Allow Regex engine to be trimmed #46813
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Eliminate framework use of 'IJSUnmarshalledRuntime' #46693
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0
  • Expand FromX support and add route vs. query param inference #46715
    area-web-frameworks
  • Expose the SslStream and Cipher Suite on ITlsHandshakeFeature #46824
    area-runtime
  • Templates.Blazor.Tests: skip Playwright based tests when Playwright is not available. #46760
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Tidy up some irregularities in certificate reloading #46819
    area-runtime
  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update servicing milestones for April servicing #46675
    blocked, area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Productize QuickGrid #46573
    area-blazor
  • [WIP] Support metadata only endpoints #46536
    area-web-frameworks
  • Sections support #46727

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tabs defined in AppShell.xaml does not invoke its view model's IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) implementaion #13537
  • Java.Lang.RuntimeException Message=Canvas: trying to use a recycled bitmap android.graphics.Bitmap@5d9bccf #13534
  • FileSystem.OpenAppPackageFileAsync -- Not on windows! #13533
  • GitHub Azure DevOps workflow exclusions are ignored #13532
    Backlog
  • DisposeAsync() on IJSObjectReference causes hanging when called on Android 11 and lower on app suspension #13529
  • Possible Memory Leak on iOS and macCatalyst #13520
    Backlog
  • MAPS Control not working #13517
  • Possibility to send basic authentication headers with Browser.Default.OpenAsync() #13515
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio cannot launch Android Emulator #13511

Closed

  • Unable to reflect assembly of MAUI application on macOS #12317
  • New Visual Studio 2022 Install - Cannot publish any .NET 7 MAUI Blazor app for Windows _GenerateAppxPackage #12625
  • AVFoundation Migration to .NET 7 Maui #12969
  • .NET MAUI app's UI Automation hierarchy has a root window element with no accessible name #12973
    Backlog
  • MAUI dotnet Publish Signs msix but the exe is not Signed #13462
  • [iOS] Grid cannot be scrolled properly in a scroll view #7373
  • Page.BackgroundColor and others not reacting to changes in Application.Current.UserAppTheme #6596
    .NET 8 Planning
  • SensorSpeed intervals are different on every platform (and some are too large) #12281
    Backlog
  • Custom gestures on image in carousel not responding/working #13504
    Backlog
  • Nuget Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK Error #13382
  • Frame missing its bottom edge #9099
  • ScrollView inside a Grid with multiple Rows and Columns not working #7607
  • Android crash - Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR) #13131
  • help the app dont want to run #13289

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix test runner issues around our stubbed windows #13536

Merged

  • Remove not used macOS Gallery app head #13527
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add Shell.Title to default template #13521
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y, area/templates 📄

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow navigations to keyless types #30331
  • Json: updating property with conversion from string to other type fails on sql server #30330
  • Why tracking queries do not update already tracked entities? #30329
  • System.InvalidOperationException: No coercion operator is defined between types 'System.DateTime' and 'System.Nullable`1[System.Int32]'. #30327
  • Query: converter from bool used in predicate without comparison fails on sqlite (and other non-sql server backends?) #30326
  • EntityTypeBuilder<T>.HasTrigger("My Trigger") #30324

Closed

  • OrderBy throws on projection to record type #30325
  • Contains on a tuple collection doesn't work #30320
  • Add expression support for abstract properties #30232
  • Configuration to opt out of occasionally problematic SaveChanges optimizations #29916
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix to #28816 - Json: add support for Sqlite provider #30302
  • Adding procedural test generation to test interactions between various operators. #30280
  • Fix to #30028 - Added nullable property to Json mapped model resulting in errors instead of mapping non existing json property to null #30101
